1. kodhapeyyālaṃ Paṇṇāsakāsaṅgahitā suttantā Ma. kodhapeyyāla.
179 Dveme bhikkhave dhammā katame dve kodho ca upanāho ... Makkho ca paḷāso ca ... Issā ca macchariyañca ... Māyā ca sātheyyañca ... Ahirikañca anottappañca ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammāti. Ma. Yu. sabbattha itisaddo natthi
180 Dveme bhikkhave dhammā katame dve akkodho ca anupanāho ca ... Amakkho ca apaḷāso ca ... Anissā ca amacchariyañca ... Amāyā ca asātheyyañca ... Hirī ca ottappañca ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammāti.
181 Dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato dukkhaṁ viharati katamehi dvīhi kodhena ca upanāhena ca ... Makkhena ca paḷāsena ca ... Issāya ca macchariyena
ca ... Māyāya ca sātheyyena ca ... Ahirikena ca anottappena ca imehi kho bhikkhave dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato dukkhaṁ viharatīti.
182 Dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato sukhaṁ viharati katamehi dvīhi akkodhena ca anupanāhena ca ... Amakkhena ca apaḷāsena ca ... Anissāya ca amacchariyena ca ... Amāyāya ca asātheyyena
Ca ... Hiriyā ca ottappena ca imehi kho bhikkhave dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato sukhaṁ viharatīti.
183 Dveme bhikkhave dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti katame dve kodho ca upanāho ca ... Makkho ca paḷāso ca ... Issā ca macchariyañca ... Māyā ca sātheyyañca ... Ahirikañca anottappañca ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattantīti.
184 Dveme bhikkhave dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattanti katame dve akkodho ca anupanāho ca ... Amakkho ca apaḷāso ca ... Anissā ca amacchariyañca ... Amāyā ca asātheyyañca ... Hiri ca ottappañca ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattantīti.
185 Dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye katamehi dvīhi kodhena ca upanāhena ca ... Makkhena ca paḷāsena ca ... Issāya ca macchariyena ca ... Māyāya ca sātheyyena ca ... Ahirikena ca anottappena ca imehi kho bhikkhave dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato
yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ nirayeti.
186 Dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge katamehi dvīhi akkodhena ca anupanāhena ca ... Amakkhena ca apaḷāsena ca ... Anissāya ca amacchariyena ca ... Amāyāya
Ca asātheyyena ca ... Hiriyā ca ottappena ca imehi kho bhikkhave dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ saggeti.
187 Dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato idhekacco kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati katamehi dvīhi kodhena ca upanāhena ca ... Makkhena ca paḷāsena ca ... ... Issāya ca macchariyena ca ... Māyāya ca sātheyyena ca ... Ahirikena ca anottappena ca imehi kho bhikkhave dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato idhekacco kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjatīti.
188 Dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato idhekacco kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati katamehi dvīhi akkodhena ca anupanāhena ca ... Amakkhena ca apaḷāsena ca ... Anissāya ca amacchariyena ca ... Amāyāya ca asātheyyena ca ... Hiriyā ca ottappena ca imehi kho bhikkhave dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato idhekacco kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjatīti.
